name: expo-background-runner
description: expo-background-runner is an Expo-compatible library that allows React Native apps to execute tasks continuously, even when the app is in the foreground, background, or completely killed. It provides a reliable way to run background operations such as syncing data, sending notifications, or performing periodic updates, with minimal setup and seamless integration into Expo projects.
author: iamnynvk <vekariyanayan2000@gmail.com> (https://github.com/iamnynvk)
